QuestData.Title: Enohar's Revenge
QuestData.Description: They... they killed my sister. Those beasts marched right through the front gates and... it was horrible.$b$bThe Dreadmaul ogres stood beside them during the attack. They will all suffer. Here take this poison, place a couple drops in their rat stew. The poison will slowly eat away at their insides. Causing a prolonged and painful death, just like they deserve.$b$bPlease, for my sister.
QuestData.LogDescription: Poison the Dreadmaul ogre food supply.
QuestData.RewardText: I wish I could be there to watch their faces as they suffer. I hope they all die a slow horrible death.
